attributes.additional_details:
Dogs are part of the family too, not just pets. 
Some people have XL bully’s as a comfort and emotional support. NOT ALL XL BULLYS ARE DANGEROUS!!
attributes.background:
I want the ban of XL’ bully’s to be stopped, there were a handful of dogs who have bitten and caused injury due to the owners. Not the dog itself!
Dogs are too quickly to be judged and killed due to other people’s responsibilities. 
BAN BAD OWNERS NOT THR DOGS.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

We also cannot accept petitions with an incomplete name.
